name: holenav
description: New mapper for make benefit of the glorious EVE community. Currently in early prototyping.

scripts.start: npm run startd && npm run logs
scripts.stop: docker compose down && docker compose -f docker-compose-ci.yaml down
scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run test:server && npm run test:e2e
scripts.lint: cd client && npm run lint && cd ../server && npm run lint && cd ../e2e && npm run lint
scripts.setup: cd client && npm ci && cd ../server && npm ci && cd ../e2e && npm ci && cd ../docs && npm ci
scripts.preversion: if [ $(git rev-parse --abbrev-ref HEAD) != 'main' ]; then exit 1; fi

author: Joonas HÃ¤kkinen <hakkijoo@gmail.com>
